name: The Dollar Game
description:
Info

Recreation of the "Dollar Game" descriped in todays (31.08.2018) Numberphile video on youtube.

Goal
  • Distribute the points in such way, that every node has a value greater or equals to zero.
Controls
  • Left-click to send 1 point to every connected node
  • Right-click to receive 1 point from every connected node
